message.body: Could you ask Shenandoah and Kofi to wash the two big pots and for Shenandoah to clean and put away the big aluminum tray that he brought out two days ago??? Thanks. Memories of cuddling on Soraya 's bed very sweet.
Okay yes it was sweet but a lite chilly
Good for you. Not surprised. Remember to avoid any impression of boasting. Love you and so glad you're enjoying your tour. Sounds like southern Italy was exactly the right choice.
I want to go to a stand up comedy show at Haverford tonight 9-10:30. With Wallace. Did you want to come too? My funny student is in it and this might be the last one of the year. They say it is good.
This is Shenandoah, could I have a sleep over tomorrow or tonight because I want to have one before spring break ends. If so, how many people could come?
You can only have it when both mom and I are here. Maybe tomorrow night I don't know
Ok tommorow night, could I invite 4 other people?
Mom said its ok with her. I'm not even sure if everyone will come so it will be at most 4 people because I don't want to make the same mistake last time I had a sleep over.
Thanks a lot. I hope you feel better.
